title: 12V SPDT Special PC Mount Relay
blurb:
Ideal for use in industrial, office and even home applications:
• Industrial: NC machines, robots, temperature, controllers
• Office: Photocopiers, vending machines
cHome: TV sets, VCR, microwave ovens
:
• Miniature package with universal terminal footprint
• High dielectric withstanding for transient protection: 10,000V surge in us between coil and contact
• Sealed construction
• Class B coil insulation
